name: Late Lies
description:
You're late for work again!

On your way to work, look around for some ideas for excuses to tell the boss! But be careful, if he loses patience with you you'll lose a sick day. If you're late with no sick days, you'll be fired!

Hint:

-The bosses mood will affect how much he'll believe your stories

-Every story has a different chance to be believed no matter what mood the boss has

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse Click - Select Inspiration Item
